cause.description:
Since the beginning of time, Gingerbread Men and Women have been suffering. They have been beaten, eaten, and sold like slaves at school bake sales. When will people learn?
1. People must stop eating Gingerbread Men.
2. Indiana Jones does not eat Gingerbread Men.
3. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately.
cause.mission: Stop violence towards Gingerbread Men and Gingerbread Women alike.
cause.name: Stop Violence Againt Gingerbread Men
